value.title: StarCraft 2: Harstem's MASS LIBERATOR Problems!
value.excerpt: He may be a man of many StarCraft talents, but is Harstem capable of beating MilkiCow's mass Liberator strategy? In this video I cast a game of professional StarCraft 2 that was recently played during the Dreamhack Atlanta European Regionals.  Support my work on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/lowkotv
